Text:
How come this is sooo small compared to this?
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3599012/Terry_Pratchett__amp__Neil_Gaiman_-_Good_Omens_The_Nice_And_Accurate

The quality isn't exactly great.

This one is narrated by an american as far as I can tell, which feels a bit odd... The link in shinjin's post is narrated by Stephen Briggs, which might be a preferable choice, if you can live with the size.
